bt: Scores were recorded and compared within and between pre-treatment, immediately post-treatment and 3 months post-treatment groups.[ results ] Intergroup comparisons immediately and 3 months post-treatment showed that extracorporeal shock therapy reduced pain significantly more than ultrasound therapy.[ conclusion] Extracorporeal urtic acid therapy can significantly reduce pain in patients with chronic tennis elbow .

src: the positive and negative syndrome scale ( panss ) was applied to assess the psychotic symptoms and aggression risk at baseline , week 2 , 4 , and 6 of the study.the results of this study showed that both protocols significantly decreased the scores on all subscales of the panss and supplemental aggression risk subscale as well as panss total score over the study . however , this improvement was significantly higher in zn sulfate receiving group compared to the placebo group . no major clinical side - effects were detected.it may be concluded that zn is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia .
bt: The positive and negative syndrome (pans) scale was applied to assess psychotic symptoms and the risk of aggression at the starting point, week 2, 4 and 6 of the study.The results of this study showed that both protocols significantly reduced scores on all sub-scales of the panes and the sub-scale of risk of additional aggression as well as the total score of the panes during the study.However, this improvement was significantly greater in the group that received sulfate than in the placebo group.No significant clinical side effects were observed.It can be concluded that it is an effective adjuvant agent in the management of patients with schizophrenia.

src: the written information contained in the accident reports pertaining to contextual and technical elements were used.the study used multiple case qualitative content analysis . this descriptive study was based on the content analysis of the 788 reports from the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec [ workers compensation board ( wcb ) ] investigating the fatal work - related accidents between 1990 and 2005 . the study was descriptive ( number and percentages ) .
bt: This descriptive study is based on the analysis of the contents of 788 reports of the commission de la sant et de la scurit du travail du qubec (committee on workers' compensation) that investigated fatal incidents related to work between 1990 and 2005.

src: functional gastrointestinal disorder ( fgid ) is one of the commonest digestive diseases worldwide and leads to significant morbidity and burden on healthcare resource . the putative bio - psycho - social pathophysiological model for fgid underscores the importance of psychological distress in the pathogenesis of fgid . concomitant psychological disorders , notably anxiety and depressive disorders , are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co - morbidities correlate with severity of fgid symptoms .
bt: The bio-psycho-social pathophysiological model for fgid emphasizes the importance of psychological stress in the pathogenesis of fgid.Concomitant psychological disorders, particularly anxiety and depressive disorders, are strongly associated with fgid and these psychological co-morbidities correlate with the severity of fgid symptoms.

src: chest pain is a rare sign of thoracal endometriosis associated with endometrioma of the tubo - ovarian endometrioma . we report the case periodic episodes of chest pain concurrent with menstruation in a 35-year - old female , in which ovarian endometrioma was diagnosed and left - sided oophorectomy was performed . after surgery , patient underwent medical treatment which included a gn - rh agonist and a combined oral contraceptive .
bt: Chest pain is a rare sign of chest endometriosis associated with tube endometriosis - ovarian endometriosis. we note the case of periodic episodes of chest pain that accompanied menstruation in a 35-year-old woman, in which an ovarian endometriosis was diagnosed and left-sidedophorectomy was performed. after surgery, the patient underwent medical treatment that included a rhonist.

src: the clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks . groups were compared according to several variables including second semester exam scores , hesi scores , and quality and timeliness of clinical paperwork . over a two - year period , seventy - one undergraduate nursing students in the second semester medical - surgical nursing course participated .
bt: The clinical experience was a total of 12 weeks, and the groups were compared according to various variables including second-semester exam scores, hesy scores and the quality and timeliness of clinical documentation.Over a two-year period, seventy university nursing students from the second-semester medical-surgical nursing course were involved.

src: we investigated erg protein expression in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca . erg expression was correlated with patients ' clinical outcome and several pathological parameters , including gleason score ( gs ) , pathological stage , surgical margin , and extra - capsular extension . erg expression was detected in 86/198 ( 43.4% ) patients exclusively in neoplastic epithelium .
bt: We studied the expression of the erg protein in a cohort of 198 men with localized pca.Erg expression was correlated with the clinical outcome of patients and various pathological parameters, including pathological stage, surgical margin and extra-capsular extension.Erg expression was detected in 86/198 (43.4%) patients exclusively in the neoplastic epithelium.

src: type ii acots fall into the ' hot dog ' fold superfamily . there are currently six human type ii genes ; however , two homologous proteins , thioesterase superfamily members 4 ( them4 ) and 5 ( them5 ) share common type ii structural features and , in the case of them4 , acyl - coa thioesterase activity -- suggesting that the family may be larger than previously realised . although recent studies have greatly expanded the current understanding of these proteins and their physiological importance , there are a number of members whose functions are relatively unexplored and which warrant further investigation .
bt: I acotti II belong to the superfamily of double-ray caldi canines.There are currently six genes of human type ii; however, two homologous proteins, and members of the thioesterase superfamily of type 4 (them4) and 5 (them5) share common structural characteristics of type ii and, in the case of type ii4, the activity of acyl-coa thioesterase - suggesting that the family may be larger than it previously realized.

src: objectiveserine - threonine kinase stk11 catalyzes the amp - activated protein kinase complex . we tested the hypothesis that a gene variant in stk11 contributes to variation in insulin sensitivity and metformin efficacy.research design and methodswe studied the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism ( snp ) ( rs8111699 ) in stk11 on endocrine - metabolic and body composition indexes before and after 1 year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic girls with androgen excess , representing a continuum from prepuberal girls with a combined history of low birth weight and precocious pubarche over to postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemic ovarian hyperandrogenism . metformin was dosed at 425 mg / day in younger girls and 850 mg / day in older girls .
bt: Our research goals are to study the effects of a single nucleotide polymorphism (snp) (rs8111699) in paragraph11 on endocrine-metabolic indices and body composition before and after a year of metformin in 85 hyperinsulinemic androgen-excess girls , representing a continuum of prepubescent girls with a combined history of low birth weight and early puberty versus postmenarchial girls with hyperinsulinemia.

src: development of novel biomaterials for drug delivery which forms a part of the so called novel drug delivery systems has always been exhilarating . mechanical evaluation of polymer based topical gels , which would be subjected to load or stress during its application , is inevitable.rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yielding . rheological modeling was also carried out.the viscosity and yield stress were inversely dependent on the eugenol concentration .
bt: The development of new biomaterials for drug delivery that are part of the so-called new drug delivery systems has always been exciting.The mechanical evaluation of topical polymer-based gels , which would have been subjected to load or stress during their application , is inevitable.The rheological characterization was done by studying viscosity and yield.A reological modelling was also carried out.The viscosity was inversely dependent on the concentration of eugenolo.

src: parasite lactate dehydrogenase ( pldh ) is extensively employed as malaria rapid diagnostic tests ( rdts ) . moreover , it is a well - known drug target candidate . however , the genetic diversity of this gene might influence performance of rdt kits and its drug target candidacy .
bt: The lattato-dehydrogenase parasite (pldh) is widely used as a rapid diagnostic test for malaria (rdts) and is also a known target candidate for drug use, however, the genetic diversity of this gene could influence the performance of the rdt kit and its target candidate for drug use.

src: beryllium was released into the air from routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant ( rfp ) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 . we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of airborne concentrations and their uncertainties and calculated lifetime cancer risks and risks of chronic beryllium disease to hypothetical receptors . this article discusses exposure - response relationships for lung cancer and chronic beryllium disease .
bt: Il berillio was released into the air during routine operations and three accidental fires at the rocky flats plant (rfp) in colorado from 1958 to 1989 we evaluated environmental monitoring data and developed estimates of concentrations and uncertainties in the air and calculated the risks of cancer and risks of chronic berillio disease at hypothetical receptors. this article discusses the exposure-response relationships for chronic berillio disease.

bt: In addition, all peeling areas documented in video on the retina surface were evaluated postoperatively using additional focal microperimetry 2.The sensitivity of the retina and the bcva are correlated with morphological changes (e.g. elm) in the foveal region and peeling regions of the membrane.In total, the bcva increased from 0.6 (0.2) to 0.2 (0.2) logmar after 6 months with an increase in the sensitivity of the retina (17.9 2.7 db to 26.8 3.1 db, p < 0,01).

src: 45 male c57bl/6j mice ( mean weight 27 g ) were anesthetized with ketamine / xylazine . animals were subjected to a weight drop closed traumatic brain injury ( wd - tbi ) , a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock ( fx - sh ) . animals were subdivided into wd - tbi , fx - sh and combined trauma ( co - tx ) groups .
bt: Topics topical maschi c57bl/6j (mean weight 27 g) were anesthetized with ketamine / xilasiene.The animals were subjected to a closed-weight trauma trauma brain injury (wd - tbi), a femoral fracture and hemorrhagic shock (fx - sh).The animals were divided into groups of combined trauma (co - tx) and combined trauma (wd - tbi , fx - sh).

src: objectivea review of the literature on coccygectomy and our patients was performed to assess the effectiveness of coccygectomy for chronic refractory coccygodynia.methodsan english language pubmed search was conducted with the terms " coccygodynia " and " coccygectomy " from january 1980 to january 2012 . we retrospectively reviewed the medical records and performed telephone questionnaire on 61 patients who underwent coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009.resultsthere were 28 case series from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who underwent coccygectomy following failed conservative management . the mean age ranged from 26.4 to 52.8 years .
bt: Objective research in english was conducted with the terms "coccygodynia" and "coccygectomy" from january 1980 to january 2012. we retrospectively examined medical records and conducted a telephone questionnaire of 61 patients who had coccygectomy at ucdmc between 1997 and 2009. the results were 28 series of cases from 1980 to 2012 for a total of 742 patients who had sub-species.

src: in the study area , pentachlorophenol and pentachlorophenol incineration sources have been identified , and the animal contamination and blood elevations probably reflect these sources . soil reference values and site - specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposures to contamination in home - produced animal products . such estimates can be verified with limited pcdd / pcdf sampling of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2
bt: In the study area, sources of incineration of pentachlorophenolic and pentachlorophenolic compounds have been identified, and animal contamination and high blood levels are likely reflecting these sources .Soil reference values and site-specific risk assessments should include estimates of exposure to contamination in animal products.These estimates can be verified with a limited sample of animals and humans.imagesfigure 1figure 2

src: resistance to fluoroquinolones ( flq ) and second - line injectable drugs ( slid ) is steadily increasing , especially in eastern european countries , posing a serious threat to effective tuberculosis ( tb ) infection control and adequate patient management . the availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensively drug - resistant tb ( xdr - tb ) is critical in areas with high rates of multidrug - resistant tb ( mdr - tb ) and xdr - tb and limited conventional drug susceptibility testing ( dst ) capacity . we conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the performance of the new version ( v2.0 ) of the genotype mtbdrsl assay compared to phenotypic dst and sequencing on a panel of 228 mycobacterium tuberculosis isolates and 231 smear - positive clinical specimens .
bt: The availability of rapid molecular tests for the detection of extensive drug-resistant tuberculosis (xdr-TB) is critical in areas with high rates of drug-resistant tuberculosis (mdr-TB) and limited sensitization testing capabilities for conventional drugs (dst).We conducted a multicenter study to evaluate the positive performance of the new version (v2.0) of the genotype mtrsl assay versus phenotypic ones by sequencing a panel of 228 isolated mycobacterial tuberculosis samples and 231 clinical smalto samples.

src: we report the rare case of an 83-year - old caucasian male affected by a giant cholesteatoma that eroded the labyrinth and the posterior fossa dura and extended to the infralabyrinthine region , going beyond the theca and reaching the first cervical vertebra . the giant cholesteatoma was managed through a combined approach ( microscopic and , subsequently , complementary endoscopic approach ) . in this case report , we illustrate some advantages of this surgical choice .
bt: The rare case of an 83-year-old Caucasian male struck by a colossal colesteatoma erodes the labyrinth and the hard posterior fossa and then extends to the infralabyrinth region, overtaking the teca and reaching the first cervical vertebra .

src: purposethe purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for recalcitrant external snapping hip.materials and methodsbetween september 2011 and june 2013 , we evaluated 7 patients ( 10 cases ) with snapping hip who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months . two patients ( 4 cases ) were impossible to adduct both knees in 90of hip flexion . surgery was done in lateral decubitus position , under spinal anesthesia .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate the clinical outcome of arthroscopic treatment for materials and methods of recalcitrant external hip interception between September 2011 and June 2013, we evaluated 7 hip intercepted patients (10 cases) who were refractory to conservative treatments for at least 3 months.Two patients (4 cases) were unable to add both knees in 90 hip flex.

src: introductiondiagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis ( ptb ) is difficult , even in developed countries , where data are lacking . the aim of the present study was to describe the clinical presentation , diagnosis , and bacterial epidemiology of ptb in france over a 10-year period.methodsa retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in france , between january 2004 and december 2014.resultsamong the 34 patients , 76.5% were migrants from areas of endemic tuberculosis ( tb ) , mainly africa . the main presentation ( 85.3% ) was a checkup of ascites or suspicion of peritoneal carcinomatosis .
bt: The introduction of a diagnosis of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) is difficult, even in developed countries where data is lacking . The objective of this study was to describe the clinical presentation, diagnosis and bacterial epidemiology of peritoneal tuberculosis (PTB) in France over a 10-year period.This retrospective study was conducted on ptb in two university hospitals in France, between January 2004 and December 2014.The results among 34 patients, 76.5% were migrants from endemic tuberculosis (TB) areas, mainly in Africa .The main presentation was an ascites control or suspected carcinoma control.

src: six months later , due to persistence of symptoms , the patient underwent a high resolution esophageal manometry ( hrem ) demonstrating jackhammer esophagus . the patient was treated with a high dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolution of her symptoms . during the last year , the patient reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and a significant weight loss .
bt: Six months later, due to the persistence of symptoms, the patient underwent a high-resolution esophageal manometry (hrem) that showed the jackhammer esophagus.The patient was treated with a high-dose proton pump inhibitor but without resolving her symptoms.During the past year, the patient has reported repeated episodes of food regurgitation and significant weight loss.

src: the failure to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment , worse final visual acuity , and a higher rate of re - operation ( p = 0.002 , p = 0.02 , and p = 0.002 , respectively ) . the location of the identified retinal break was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in the other quadrants.conclusionsthe inability to identify a retinal break during surgery was associated with a poor final outcome . other factors were less important for the functional and anatomic success in patients with pseudophakic rds .
bt: The lack of identification of a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a lower rate of retinal reattachment, a worse final visual acuity and a higher rate of reoperation (p = 0.002, p = 0.02 and p = 0.002, respectively).The location of the identified retinal rupture was more common in the superotemporal quadrant than in other quadrants.Conclusions.The inability to identify a retinal rupture during surgery was associated with a poor final result.Other factors were less important for functional and anatomical success in patients with pseudophagic rds.

src: we reviewed a cohort of patients with previously untreated locoregional advanced head and neck squamous cell carcinoma ( hnscc ) who received a uniform chemoradiotherapy regimen . retrospective review was performed of 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at greater baltimore medical center from 2000 to 2007 . radiation included 125 cgy twice daily for a total 70 gy to the primary site .
bt: We examined a cohort of patients with non-previously treated test-cell and advanced locoregional neck squamous cell carcinoma (hnscc) who received a uniform chimoradiotherapy regimen .The retrospective review was performed on 105 patients with stage iii or iv hnscc treated at Greater Baltimore Medical Center from 2000 to 2007 .The radiation comprised 125 cgy twice daily for a total of 70 gy at the primary site .

src: liver metastases from colorectal carcinoma commonly form nodular lesions in the liver parenchyma . we report a case of liver metastasis from rectal adenocarcinoma that extended predominantly into the bile duct . a 62-year - old japanese man underwent low anterior resection for rectal adenocarcinoma 9 years ago .
bt: The hepatic metastasis of corretto carcinoma usually forms nodal lesions in the parenchima hepatica. we are reporting a case of hepatic metastasis of adenocarcinoma rettale that extends predominantly in the bile duct. a 62-year-old Japanese man underwent a low anterior resection for adenocarcinoma rettale 9 years ago.

src: drug - eluting stents ( des ) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with obstructive coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention ( pci ) is feasible . however , stent thrombosis seems to occur more frequently with des and occasionally is associated with resistance to anti - platelet drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .
bt: Eluting stents (des) are considered the treatment of choice for most patients with coronary artery disease when percutaneous intervention (PCI) is feasible . However , stent thrombosis appears to occur more frequently with occasional and associated resistance to anti-piastronetic drugs . we have experienced a case of recurrent stent thrombosis in a patient with clopidogrel resistance .

bt: The mean change in hemoglobin level for 15 patients who completed at least nine treatments was 1.7 g/dL (median, 1.1 g/dL; gamma, 1.9 g/dL to 3.2 g/dL); it reached 2.1 g/dL (median, 1.3 g/dL; gamma, 0,2 g/dL to 4.6 g/dL; p = 0.0007) for 14 patients who completed all 12 treatments.

src: overall 86.9% of respondents felt that the proposed hierarchical nature of injuries was appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agreed that that the risk of neurologic injury is highest in a vertical fracture through the foramen . almost 80% of respondents felt that the separation of injuries based on the integrity of l5s1 facet was appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons agreed that a nondisplaced sacral u fracture is a clinically relevant entity . conclusion this study determines the global perspective on controversial areas in the injury patterns of sacral fractures and demonstrates that the development of a comprehensive and universally accepted sacral classification is possible .
bt: In general , 86.9% of respondents believe that the proposed hierarchical nature of injury is appropriate , and 77.8% of respondents agree that the risk of neurological injury is higher in a vertical fracture through the foramen . Almost 80% of respondents believe that the separation of lesions based on the integrity of the l5s1 side is appropriate , and 83.8% of surgeons believe that a non-dislocated sacral fracture is a clinically relevant entity .

bt: The metsy was defined according to the National Cholesterol Education Program and the third panel of adult treatment .All predictive performance was provided using the congedo - one - out cross-validated logistic regression and the curve methods characteristic of the recipient's operation.

src: introductioncare coordination is an important aspect of nursing care especially for elderly patients admitted to an acute care setting . in singapore care coordination and transitional care nursing is a new concept of care nevertheless important but unexplored.aim/objectivesthe objective of this paper is to explore the characteristics of elderly patients receiving care coordination , determine care gaps and intervention during home visit and telephonic review.research design and samplinga designed questionnaire was used to collect information on the patient s demography , social and clinical profile and determine post discharge activities using eric coleman s four pillars tool . a pilot study of ten questionnaires was conducted .
bt: In Singapore, coordination of care and transient care is a new concept of care that is still important but unexplored.Objective/ObjectiveThe purpose of this paper is to explore the characteristics of older patients receiving treatment coordination, identify gaps in treatment and intervention during home visit and telephone review.The research project and sample of the project question were used to gather information about patient demography, social and clinical profile and determine the post-discharge using the site.

src: fundamental problems with personality disorders ( pd ) diagnostic system in the previous version of dsm , led to the revision of dsm . therefore , a multidimensional system has been proposed for diagnosis of personality disorder features in dsm-5 . in the dimensional approach of dsm-5 , personality disorders diagnosis is based on levels of personality functioning ( criteria a ) and personality trait domains ( criteria b).the purpose of this study was firstly , to examine the dsm-5 levels of personality functioning in antisocial and borderline personality disorders , and second , to explore which levels of personality functioning in patients with antisocial and borderline personality disorders can better predicted severity than others.this study had a cross sectional design .
bt: The fundamental problems with the DSM diagnostic system (pd) in the previous version of dsm led to the revision of dsm. Therefore, a multidimensional system for diagnosing the characteristics of dsm-5 personality disorder was proposed. dsm-5's dimensional approach to dsm-5, diagnosing personality disorders based on levels of personality function (criteria a) and domains of personality traits (criteria b).The purpose of this study was, first, to examine the levels of dsm-5 function in patients with antisocial borderline personality disorders, and, second, to explore what levels of personality function in patients with antisocial borderline personality disorders were.

src: chromosome 22q13.3 deletion syndrome is a well - recognized cause of global developmental delay , while duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence . the presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported , to our knowledge . we report a rare occurrence of 22q13.3 duplication and 22q13.3 deletion in siblings , as a consequence of a mother 's inversion on her 22nd chromosome ( p13;q13.32 ) .
bt: The syndrome of chromosome deletion 22q13.3 is a well-known cause of delayed global development, while the duplication of the same chromosome is a rare occurrence.The presence of both abnormalities in the same family has never been reported, to our knowledge.

src: maternal - fetal genotype combinations at these loci are hypothesized to have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy which can affect fetal neurodevelopment and increase schizophrenia susceptibility . this article reviews maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility studies and schizophrenia and discusses the hypothesized biological role of these incompatibility genes . it concludes that research is needed to further elucidate the role of rhd and hla - b maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a maternal - fetal genotype incompatibility mechanism .
bt: It is hypothesized that maternal-fetal genotypes in these locations have an effect on the maternal immune system during pregnancy that may influence fetal neurodevelopment and increase sensitivity to schizophrenia.This article reviews studies of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility with schizophrenia and discusses the hypothetical biological role of these incompatibility genes. concludes that research is needed to further clarify the role of rhd and h-b maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility in schizophrenia and to identify other genes that produce an adverse prenatal environment through a mechanism of maternal-fetal genotypes incompatibility.

src: the aim of this study was to evaluate clinical characteristics , prognostic factors , survival rates , and treatment modalities in patients with primary gastric lymphoma ( pgl ) . we retrospectively reviewed and analyzed data from patients treated for pgl in our clinic from 1998 through 2010 . staging was performed using the lugano staging system .
bt: The purpose of this study was to evaluate clinical features, prognostic factors, survival rates and treatment patterns in patients with primary gastric lymphoma (PGL). we examined data from patients treated for LGP in our clinic from 1998 to 2010 .

src: the factors affecting the correlation between parkinson disease ( pd ) and depression have remained unclear.we assessed the prevalence of depression among patients with pd and the association between pd - related variables and depression severity.this is a cross - sectional study performed in kermanshah province of iran . sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria . patients with confirmed parkinson disease who were referred to clinics of kermanshah university of medical sciences participated in this study .
bt: The factors influencing the correlation between Parkinson's disease (PD) and depression remain unclear. we assessed the prevalence of depression among PD patients and the association between PD-related variables and the severity of depression.This is a cross-sectional study conducted in the province of Kermanshah in Iran.The sampling was based on recruitment of subjects according to inclusion and exclusion criteria.

bt: The detection of unknown variants in heterogeneous samples depends on a fluorimetric analysis of signal intensity based on the principle that homosigotide samples generate twice the amount of signal.This method can identify unknown snp under heterogeneous conditions with a sensitivity of 82% and a specificity of 90%.

src: american trypanosomiasis or chagas disease is a debilitating disease representing an important social problem that affects , approximately , 10 million people in the world . the main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the different stages of this disease . in this context , the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants , synthetic or semi synthetic molecules , is an important strategy .
bt: Trypanosomiasis or Chagas disease is a debilitating American disease that represents a major social problem affecting about 10 million people worldwide.The main aggravating factor of this situation is the lack of an effective drug to treat the various stages of this disease.In this context, the search for trypanocidal substances isolated from plants, synthetic or semisynthetic molecules, is an important strategy.

src: triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato ( s.l . ) , the main vector of chagas disease in northeastern brazil , is a species complex comprising four species , one with two subspecies ( t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis , t. sherlocki , and t. melanica ) , and each taxon displaying distinct ecological requirements . in order to evaluate the genetic relationships among nine t. brasiliensis s.l .
bt: Triatoma brasiliensis sensu lato (s.l.), the main vector of Chagas disease in northeastern Brazil , is a species complex composed of four species, one with two subspecies (t. brasiliensis brasiliensis , t. brasiliensis macromelasoma , t. juazeirensis and t. sherlocki and t. melanica) and each taxon with distinct ecological requirements.

src: skin - lightening is an aesthetic practice of global concern . by adopting a biopsycho - social approach , we consider the interplay between the biological , psychological and social factors that underpin the circulation and consumption of skin lighteners in south africa . this paper reflects on biological aspects of skin lightening , interpersonal relationships , individual beliefs and expectations about the maintenance of health and well being that informs cosmetic practices .
bt: Taking a biopsycho-social approach, we consider the interaction between biological, psychological and social factors that support the circulation and consumption of skin briquettes in South Africa.This paper reflects on the biological aspects of skin briquettes, interpersonal relationships, individual beliefs and expectations about health and well-being that inform cosmetic practices.

src: similar codes were grouped into categories , and broader themes were developed from these categories . four themes were identified : social network and relationships ; interactions with agencies ; recognition of role ; and time for oneself . by identifying what affects carers ' quality of life , an appropriate choice can be made when selecting instruments for future carer research .
bt: The codes have been grouped into similar categories and broader themes have been developed from these categories.Four themes have been identified: social networking and relationships; interactions with agencies; role recognition; and time for itself.By identifying what influences caregivers' quality of life, an appropriate choice can be made when selecting tools for future caregiver research.

src: pancreatic cell failure leads to diabetes development . during disease progression , cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate the elevated glycaemia and the peripheral insulin resistance . this compensatory mechanism involves a fine - tuned regulation to modulate the endoplasmic reticulum ( er ) capacity and quality control to prevent unfolded proinsulin accumulation , a major protein synthetized within the cell .
bt: During disease progression, cells adapt their secretory capacity to compensate for high blood sugar and peripheral insulin resistance, and this compensation mechanism involves fine-tuned regulation to modulate the capacity and quality control of the endoplasmic reticulum (er) to prevent the buildup of proinsulin, one of the main proteins synthesized within the cell.

src: mitochondrial genomes often contain large amounts of plastid dna ( ptdna)-derived sequences ( mtpts ) . it has been suggested that the intercompartmental transfer of ptdna is greatly reduced in species with only a single plastid per cell ( monoplastidic ) as compared with those with many plastids per cell ( polyplastidic ) . this hypothesis has not been applied to the movement of dna from plastids to mitochondria .
bt: Mitochondrial genomes often contain large quantities of DNA plastids (ptdna) derivative sequences (mtpts). it has been suggested that the intercompartimental transfer of ptdna is significantly reduced in species with only one single plastids per cell (monoplastidical) compared to those with many plastids per cell (polyplastidical).

src: many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine . however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been compared in one study . this study aimed at investigating the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , a thyroid hormone cream and a silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of skin wounds surgically induced in wistar rats for determining the treatment of choice .
bt: Many research studies report the healing effects of aloe vera , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine , however , the effects of these therapeutic agents are not well understood and have not been confronted in a single study this study sought to investigate the effects of topical application of an aloe vera gel , thyroid hormone cream and silver sulfadiazine cream on the healing of surgically induced skin wounds in rats to determine the treatment of choice .

src: a latent content analysis was used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.resultswe found dominant masculine ideals characterised by overt economic power and multiple sexual partners . reasons for large concurrent sexual networks were the perception that women were too empowered , could not be trusted , and lack of control over women . existing masculine norms encourage concurrent sexual networks , ignoring the high risk of hiv transmission .
bt: An analysis of latent content has been used to explore the characteristics and dynamics of social and sexual relationships.results have found dominant male ideals characterized by overwhelming economic power and multiple sexual partners. the reasons for the large sexual networks competing were the perception that women were over-responsible and lack of control over women.

src: introductionthe spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach , breast , pancreas and colon . it is however an unusual site for metastatic disease . the reasons for this are not fully understood at the present time .
bt: The introduction of the spleen is a highly vascular organ and is in close proximity to many potential primary sites such as the stomach, breast, pancreas and colon, but it is an unusual site for metastatic disease.

src: it is known that the brain adaptively recalibrates itself to small ( 100 ms ) auditory visual ( av ) temporal asynchronies so as to maintain intersensory temporal coherence . here we explored whether spatial disparity between a sound and light affects av temporal recalibration . participants were exposed to a train of asynchronous av stimulus pairs ( sound - first or light - first ) with sounds and lights emanating from either the same or a different location .
bt: It is noted that the brain recalibrates itself adaptively to small (100 ms) temporal visual auditory (av) signals to maintain intersensitive temporal coherence.Here we have explored whether the spatial disparity between a sound and a light influences the temporal recalibration.The participants were exposed to a train of paired signalling stimuli av (sound - prima or light - prima) with sounds and lights emanating from the same or a different place.

src: three - way anova was used to compare the factors implant length , crown height , and implant system ( = 0.05 ) . the results showed that implant length was a statistically significant factor for both axial and nonaxial loading . the 13 mm prosthetic crown did not result in statistically significant differences in stress distribution between the implant systems and implant lengths studied , regardless of load type ( p > 0.05 ) .
bt: The new tri-way was used to compare the factors of length of the implant, height of the crown and the implant system (=0.05).The results showed that the length of the implant was a statistically significant factor for both axial and non-axial load.The 13 mm protective crown did not result in a statistically significant difference in the distribution of stress between the implant systems and the length of the implants studied, regardless of the type of load (p >0.05).

src: head and neck squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common neoplasms worldwide and characterized by local tumor aggressiveness , high rate of early recurrences , development of metastasis , and second primary cancers . despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management , overall survival - rates remained largely unchanged over the last decades . thus , the need for novel treatment options for this tumor entity is undeniable .
bt: T-cell and cervical squamous cell carcinomas are among the most common tumors worldwide and are characterized by local tumor aggressiveness, high rates of premature recurrence, development of metastases and primary secondary tumors.Despite modern therapeutic strategies and sophisticated surgical management, overall survival rates have remained largely unchanged over the past few decades.

src: in the latest year , and also in 2013 , salmonella was the most frequently detected causative agent in foodborne outbreaks ( fbos ) reported in europe . as indicated in efsa report ( 2015 ) the serotypes mostly associated to fbos are s. typhimurium and enteritidis ; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with the consumption of contaminated pork and beef , fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are linked to eggs and poultry meat . in this study it is described the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and linked to homemade lasagne .
bt: In the last year, and even in 2013, salmonella has been the most frequently detected causative agent in the food epidemics (fbos) reported in Europe.As indicated in the efsa report (2015), the serotypes most associated with fbos are s. typhimurium e enteritidis; while salmonella typhimurium is generally associated with consumption of contaminated pork and beef, fbos due to salmonella enteritidis are related to eggs and beef.In this study siagna describes the investigation of a domestic fbo involving four adults and related to all homemade lasso.

src: using 64-channel multidetector row computed tomographic angiography ( mdcta ) , we evaluated morphological features of the major systemic vessels in micropigs and compared our results to published human data . the main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans , except for the iliac arterial system . however , diameters of the major systemic vessels were significantly different between micropigs and humans .
bt: Using the 64-channel line of multi-detector computed tomography (mdcta) scanners, we evaluated the morphological characteristics of the main systemic vessels in the micro-cinnonium and compared our results with published human data.The main vasculature of the animals was similar to that of humans, except for the arterial iatotic system.However, the diameters of the main systemic vessels were significantly different between the micro-cinnonium and humans.

src: essential palatal tremor ( ept ) is a rare disorder which shows rhythmic involuntary movement of the muscles of soft palate , especially tensor veli palatini muscle . ept is classified by two subtypes , which is primary and secondary ept . secondary ept includes psychogenic type .
bt: Ept is classified by two subtypes , which are primary and secondary ept.

src: atlantic correction equations were developed in the mhw subsample . using separate multiple regression models for men and women , self - reported body mass index ( bmi ) was corrected by multiplying the self - reported estimate by its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intercept . paired t - tests were used to determine whether corrected mean bmi values were significantly more accurate ( i.e. , closer to measured data ) than the equivalent means based on self - reported data .
bt: In the mhw example, atlantic correction equations were developed using multiple regression models separated for men and women, the self-relevant body mass index (bmi) was corrected by multiplying the self-relevant estimate with its corresponding model coefficient and adding the model intersection.

src: granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor ( gm - csf ) is a hematopoietic growth factor , which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells . in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases , th17 cells have been considered as strong inducers of tissue inflammation . however , recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has prominent proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor ( not il-17 ) is critical for the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells .
bt: Granulocyte macrophage - colony stimulating factor (gm - csf) is a hematopoietic growth factor, which stimulates the proliferation of granulocytes and macrophages from bone marrow precursor cells. in autoimmune and inflammatory diseases, th17 cells have been considered strong inducers of tissue inflammation. however, recent evidence indicates that gm - csf has important proinflammatory functions and that this growth factor (not il-17) is critical to the pathogenicity of cd4 + t cells.

src: the initial step of atrioventricular ( av ) valve development involves the deposition of extracellular matrix ( ecm ) components of the endocardial cushion and the endocardialmesenchymal transition . while the appropriately regulated expression of the major ecm components , versican and hyaluronan , that form the endocardial cushion is important for heart valve development , the underlying mechanism that regulates ecm gene expression remains unclear . we found that zebrafish crip2 expression is restricted to a subset of cells in the av canal ( avc ) endocardium at 55 hours post - fertilization ( hpf ) .
bt: While the adequately regulated expression of the main components of the ECM , versican and ialuronan , which form the endocardial cushion, is important for the development of the heart valve, the underlying mechanism that regulates the expression of the ECM gene remains uncertain.We found that the expression of zebrafish crip2 is limited to a subset of cells in the endocardial canal (avc) at 55 hours after the fertilization of hpf.

src: leonurus cardiaca , commonly known as motherwort , is a member of the lamiaceae family . it has a number of interesting biological activities , for example , sedative and hypotensive , antioxidant , anti - inflammatory , and antimicrobial activities . the aim of the present study was to investigate the effect of alcoholic extract of aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on nociceptive response using formalin , tail flick , and hot plate tests in mice .
bt: The present study aims to study the effect of an alcoholic extract of the aerial part of leonurus cardiaca on the noxious reactive response using formalin and tail flick.

src: peripheral osteomas of jaw bone are uncommon and usually associated with gardner 's syndrome . histological examination confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma . patient was reviewed after one year and was asymptomatic with no recurrence of the lesion .
bt: Peripheral osteomas of the jaw bone are rare and soluble in Gardner syndrome, and histological examination has confirmed the clinical impression of a peripheral osteoma, and the patient was examined after a year and was asymptomatic without recurrence of injury.

src: carcinoid bronchopulmonary tumors represent approximately 25% of all carcinoid tumors and 1%2% of all lung neoplasms . the most common symptoms are : persistent cough , asthma - like wheezing , chest pain , dyspnea , hemoptysis and obstructive pneumonitis . we present a case of a young adult diagnosed with a typical carcinoid tumor .
bt: Broncho-pulmonary carcinogens account for about 25% of all carcinogens and 1%-2% of all lung tumors.The most common symptoms are: persistent cough, asthma - such as soffiare, chest pain, dyspnea, emptys and obstructive pneumonitis.

src: matrix metalloproteinase-9 ( mmp-9 ) , regulated by tissue inhibitor of metalloproteinase-9 ( timp-1 ) and the extracellular matrix metalloproteinase inducer ( emmprin ) , contributes to plaque instability . autologous stem cells from bone marrow ( mbmc ) treatment are suggested to reduce myocardial damage ; however , limited data exists on the influence of mbmc on mmps . we investigated the influence of mbmc on circulating levels of mmp-9 , timp-1 , and emmprin at different time points in patients included in the randomized autologous stem - cell transplantation in acute myocardial infarction ( astami ) trial ( n = 100 ) .
bt: The leci metalloproteinase-9 (mmp-9) regulated by the inhibitor of the tissues of metalloproteinase-9 (timp-1) and the extracellular inductor of metalloproteinase (emmprin) contribute to all plaque instability . It is suggested that the autologous stem cells of bone marrow treatment (mbmc) reduce damage to the myocardium; however, there are limited data on the influence of mbmc on mmps . We have studied the influence of mbmc at the circulatory levels of mmp-9 , mmp-1 and emprin at various points in time in patients including trapiant cells from randomized stem cells in a study of different time periods.

src: in the closed structure of the p2x cation channel , three -helical transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely : in rat p2x2 receptors , these intersect at thr339 . replacing thr339 by lysine in one , two or three subunits progressively increased chloride permeability and reduced unitary conductance . this implies that the closed - open transition involves a symmetrical separation of the three subunits , and that thr339 from each contributes symmetrically to the open channel permeation pathway .
bt: In the closed structure of the cation channel , three helico-shaped transmembrane domains cross the membrane obliquely: in the p2x2 receptors of the top , these intersect with thr339 . By replacing thr339 with lysine in one , two or three subunits , they progressively increase the permeability of the chloride and reduce unit conductivity .

bt: During the follow-up period, 3.4% of participants responded adequately to only non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drugs, 57.6% to sulfasalazine, 26.3% to methotrexate supplementation to the previous regimen, and 12.7% to biological agents.During multiple logistic regression results, the underlying disease showed a significant effect on sulfasalazine response.The likelihood of treatment response was 3.53 times higher in these patients than in other patients (probability ratio = 3.53, 95% confidence interval: 1.637.6).

src: recently , management of ludwig 's angina has evolved from aggressive airway management into a more conservative one . this is based on close airway observation on a specialised airway unit and a serial clinical airway assessment . improved imaging modalities , antibiotic therapy , surgical skills , and clinical experience are the key factors behind this change in practice .
bt: Recently, the management of ludwig's angina has gone from an aggressive management of air life to a more conservative one.

src: in the 3d method of treatment , three - dimensional images from computer tomography were used . in treatment plans performed using the 2d method , images from the simulator were used.resultsthe comparison of treatment plans made by using 2d and 3d methods is described . this comparison highlighted the significant differences between these two methods assessing reference dose coverage of the ptv by 100% and 85% isodose.conclusionsreference doses with 100% coverage of the ptv in treatment applied with the 3d method are 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method .
bt: In the 3d treatment method, three-dimensional images were used, and computed tomography. in the 2d treatment plan, simulator images were used. the result of comparing the treatment plans with the 2d and 3d methods is described. this comparison has highlighted the significant differences between these two methods that assess the coverage of the reference dose of 100% ptv and 85% isodose. conclusions The reference dose with coverage of 100% ptv in the treatment applied with the 3d method is 31% higher than when applied with the 2d method.

bt: The variables relative to obesity, lipid profile and glucose metabolism were also higher in people with diabetes and in people with grade ii diabetes without diabetes, compared to controls.An analysis of multivariate gradual regression showed a negative correlation between hrv and total cholesterol and percentage of fat.The grade of nafld contributes to a decrease in cardiovascular autonomic function, with diabetic status rather than the grade of nafld playing a critical role.

src: objectivediabetic patients have a high prevalence of coronary artery disease ( cad ) , but timely diagnosis of cad remains challenging . we assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography ( ccta ) to detect cad in diabetic patients and to predict subsequent cardiac events.research design and methodswe analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta ; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group . besides calcium scoring and the degree of the most severe stenosis , the atherosclerotic burden score counting the number of segments having either a nonstenotic plaque or a stenosis was recorded .
bt: We assessed the ability of coronary computed tomography angiography (ccta) to detect cad in diabetic patients and predict subsequent cardiac events. design and research methods we analyzed 140 diabetic patients without known cad undergoing ccta; 1,782 patients without diabetes were used as a control group. in addition to the calcium score and the degree of severe stenosis, the atherosclerosis score was recorded by counting the number of segments that have a non-stenosic plaque or a sten

src: objectivethe mental health of military personnel varies as a result of different cultural , political , and administrative factors . the purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in taiwan.materials and methodsthis cross - sectional study utilized the world health organization quality of life instrument , brief version , taiwan version , the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version , and the visual analog scale ( vas ) in several military units.resultsmore than half of the subjects ( 55.3% ) identified themselves as mentally unhealthy on the general health questionnaire-12 , chinese version ; however , a higher percentage of officers perceived themselves as healthy ( 57.4% ) than did noncommissioned officers ( 38.5% ) or enlisted men ( 42.2% ) . officers also had higher total quality of life ( qol ) scores ( 83.98 ) than did enlisted men ( 79.67 ) .
bt: The goal of military personnel's mental health varies due to various cultural, political and administrative factors.The purpose of this study was to evaluate the psychological morbidity and quality of life of military personnel in Taiwan.Materials and methodsThis cross-sectional study has used the World Health Organization's tool on quality of life, shortened version, Taiwanese version, General Health Questionnaire-12 , Chinese version, and visual analogue scale (vas) in military units.ResultsOver half of the subjects (5.3%) were identified as mentally ill in the General Health Questionnaire-12 , Chinese version; however, a higher percentage of officers were perceived as ill.

bt: In the transfetted il-10 system, corm-2 had no effect on the lps-induced expression of tn-c and its cytokines in the valley. These data suggest that il-10 mediates the inhibitory effect of co sul tn-c and the valley production of proinfiammatory cytokines.

src: after confirmation of behet 's disease on the basis of a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and erythema nodosum , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , catheter directed thrombolysis and thrombectomy . however , whilst maintaining anticoagulation therapy , a newly developed pericardial aneurysmal dilatation was noted on follow - up radiologic evaluation . further evaluation revealed right coronary artery stenosis and a left coronary artery pseudo aneurysm ; these additional problems were treated with the nonsurgical insertion of an endovascular graft stent .
bt: Confirmation of Behet's disease based on a history of recurrent oral and genital ulcers and nodular erythema , remission was achieved after treatment with methylprednisolone pulse therapy , colchicine , direct thrombolysis with catheter and thrombectomy . However , while maintaining anticoagulant therapy , a recent development of pericardial aneurysmal dilation was noted following radiological evaluation .

src: we developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method for quantifying methyleugenol ( me ) in human serum . our method uses a simple solid - phase extraction followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry . our method is very accurate ; its limit of detection is 3.1 pg / g and its average coefficient of variation is 14% over a 200-pg / g range .
bt: We have developed a sensitive and accurate analytical method to quantify methyl myelogenol in human serum using a simple solid-phase stratum followed by a highly specific analysis using isotope dilution gas chromatography - high resolution mass spectrometry.Our method is very accurate; its detection limit is 3.1 pg/g and its mean coefficient of variation is 14% over an interval of 200 pg/g.

src: backgroundlimbal ring ( also known as circle ) contact lenses are becoming increasingly popular , especially in asian markets because of their eye - enhancing effects . the pigment particles that give the eye - enhancing effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or enclosed within the lens matrix . the purpose of this research was to evaluate the pigment location and surface roughness of seven types of circle contact lenses.methodsscanning electron microscopic ( sem ) analysis was performed using a variable pressure hitachi s3400n instrument to discern the placement of lens pigments .
bt: Pigment particles that damage the eyes to improve the effects of these lenses can be found on the front or back surface of the contact lens or closed inside the lens matrix.The purpose of this research was to evaluate the position of the pigment and the surface roughness of seven types of contact lens in a circle.Methodesscanning electron microscopic (sem) analysis was performed using a variable pressure instrument Hitachi S3400N to discern the positioning of the lens pigments.

src: subsidence and late fusion are commonly observed in anterior subtotal corpectomy and reconstruction for treating thoracolumbar burst fractures . the subsidence rate of this surgical method was reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literatures , which would cause treatment failure . thus , an improvement of anterior surgery technique should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients of thoracolumbar burst fractures treated by minimal corpectomy , decompression and u cage , between january 2009 and december 2010 were included in this study .
bt: The absorption rate of this surgical method has been reported from 19.6% to 75% in the literature, which would cause a treatment failure.Therefore, if an improvement in the technique of previous surgery should be studied to reduce these complications.130 patients with thoracic subtotal fracture treated with minimal corpetomy, decompression and cage, between January 2009 and December 2010 were included in this study.

src: retroperitoneal liposarcoma is a rare tumor . the dimension and weight of liposarcoma are variable ; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. herein , we report giant retroperitoneal liposarcoma measuring 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight encasing the entire left kidney and adherent to adjacent structures .
bt: The size and weight of the liposarcoma are variable; those over 20 kg are called giant liposarcoma. which, we note, is a giant liposarcoma of 45 cm in diameter and 25 kg in weight that surrounds the entire left kidney and adheres to adjacent structures.

src: fondaparinux sodium is a synthetic , sulfated pentasaccharide , selective factor xa inhibitor , a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing thrombus formation in patients with acute coronary syndromes , including those with st - segment elevation myocardial infarction ( stemi ) , non - stemi ( nstemi ) , or unstable angina . major bleeding is rarely known to exist with the use of fondaparinux and to best of our knowledge there exist no isolated case report presenting with fondaparinux - induced major bleeding prescribed for recently diagnosed nstemi . the case report highlights , a need for clinicians to have a sound understanding of anticoagulant pharmacology , dosing , toxicity , individualized approach , and predicting the risk of bleeding before they are prescribed to advancing age persons .
bt: Sodium pentasaccaride is a synthetic pentasaccaride sulfate, inhibitor of selective factor xa, a safe and effective antithrombotic agent indicated for preventing the formation of thrombus in patients with acute coronary syndromes, including those with myocardial infarction (stemi) of elevation of the st segment, non-stemi (nstemi) or unstable angina.

bt: This information was cross-referenced with a national manufacturer's road safety administration table that lists the drl conditions to determine the drl status of the vehicle.The crude incident rates for vehicles were calculated in relation to the number of all vehicles registered in Minnesota in 2004, for models 1995-2002.Fifty-nine percent confidence intervals for the cups were constructed assuming a distribution of fish errors. results during 1995-2002, there were 184,637 vehicles (in 1995 or more recently) with identifiable wine involvement.

src: whole blood cultures were stimulated with phytohemagglutinin ( pha ) and concentrations of tumour necrosis factor ( tnf ) , interferon ( ifn ) , interleukin 2 ( il-2 ) , interleukin 12 ( il-12 ) , interleukin 4 ( il-4 ) , and interleukin 10 ( il-10 ) were determined by elisas . a significant increase in cytokine release was detected in hr - hpv - positive women without dysplasia . in women with cervical cancer , release of ifn and il-12 was of the same magnitude as in hr - hpv - positive women without clinical manifestations .
bt: Blood cultures were stimulated with phytoemagglutinin (pha) and concentrations of tumor necrosis factor (tnf), interferon (ifn), interleukin 2 (il-2), interleukin 12 (il-12), interleukin 4 (il-4) and interleukin 10 (il-10) were determined by the tests .A significant increase in cytokine release was observed in women with hr-HPv-positive without dysplasia .In women with cervical cancer , the release of ifn was of the same magnitude as that of women with hr-HPv-positive without clinical manifestations .

src: we have previously isolated -cop , the -cop interactor in copi of aspergillus nidulans , by yeast two - hybrid screening . to understand the function of -cop , the anea+ gene for -cop / anea was deleted by homologous recombination using a gene - specific disruption cassette . deletion of the -cop gene showed no detectable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but resulted in decrease in the production of the fruiting body , cleistothecium , under conditions favorable for sexual development .
bt: We previously isolated -cop , the interactor -cop in copi di aspergillus nidulans , with yeast due - screening hybrid . To understand the function of -cop , the gene anea+ per -cop / anea was eliminated by recombination homolog using a specific genetic interruption tape . the deletion of the gene -cop did not show noticeable changes in vegetative growth or asexual development , but it led to a decrease in the production of the fertile body under conditions favorable to sexual development .

src: the number of death due to cancer has been increasing in korea . chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it damages not only cancerous cells but healthy cells . recently , attention has focused on food - derived chemopreventive and anti - tumor agents or formulations with fewer side effects .
bt: The number of cancer deaths is on the rise in Korea.Chemotherapy is known to cause side effects because it not only damages tumor cells but also healthy cells.Recently, attention has been focused on chemopreventive and antitumor agents derived from food or formulations with fewer side effects.

src: exosomes are small extracellular vesicles , which stem from endosomes fusing with the plasma membrane , and can be recaptured by receiving cells . they contain lipids , proteins , and rnas able to modify the physiology of receiving cells . functioning of the brain relies on intercellular communication between neural cells .
bt: Exosomes are small extracellular vesicles, derived from endosomes that fuse with the plasma membrane, and can be recaptured by the recipient cells.

src: food chain information ( fci ) is an innovation of the new european regulation . its purpose is to enhance the concept of food security . fci includes specifications such as : health status , information on treatments and diseases , analytical reports on control plans , zoonoses or environmental contaminants , production performance , etc .
bt: Food chain information (fci) is an innovation of the new european regulation, which aims to improve the concept of food safety. the fci includes specifications such as health status, information on treatments and diseases, analytical reports on control plans, zoonoses or environmental contaminants, productivity performance, etc.

src: randomized studies have shown different magnitude of bevacizumab benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer . regulatory agencies have modified bevacizumab treatment indications across different regions . in this study , we perform a meta - analysis of phase iii studies aiming to interrogate the magnitude of bevacizumab benefit for the treatment of first - line her2-negative metastatic breast cancer ( mbc ) .
bt: Randomized studies have shown various dimensions of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of advanced breast cancer, regulatory agencies have modified the indications for bevacizumab treatment in different regions, and in this study we conduct a meta-analysis of phase iii studies aimed at questioning the extent of bevacizumab's benefit in the treatment of her2-negative metastatic breast cancer (mbc).

src: recent work demonstrates that retention of a single functional retinoblastoma susceptibility ( rb1 ) allele is insufficient to maintain genome stability . haploinsufficiency of rb1 accelerates cancer pathogenesis in concert with inactivation of tumor protein p53 . collectively , multiple lines of evidence suggest revision of the 2-hit model to include conditional haploinsufficiency of rb1 .
bt: Recent research has shown that the conservation of a single functional allele of retinoblastoma sensitivity (rb1 ) is insufficient to maintain the stability of the genome.Rb1 deficiency accelerates tumor pathogenesis in concertation with the inactivation of tumor protein p53.

src: this research takes place in the s(ma)2d project which proposes software architecture to monitor elderly people in their own homes . we want to build patterns dynamically from data about activity , movements , and physiological information of the monitored people . to achieve that , we propose a multiagent method of classification : every agent has a simple know - how of classification .
bt: This research is carried out in the project s) ma2d which proposes a software architecture to monitor the elderly in their homes.We want to build models dynamically based on activity data, movements and physiological information of the people monitored.To achieve this goal, we propose a multi-agent method of classification: each agent has a simple knowledge of classification.

src: backgroundthe aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of vestibular - evoked myogenic potentials ( vemps ) in the assessment and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otologic diseases characterized by pseudo - conductive components . we also investigated the clinical appearance of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the findings of caloric testing and pure tone audiometry(pta).material / methodsair - conducted(ac ) 4-pta , bone - conducted(bc ) 4-pta , air - bone gap(abg ) , ac , bc tone burst evoked vemp , and calorics were measured preoperatively in 126 otosclerotic ears.resultsthe response rate of the ac - vemps and bc - vemps was 29.36% and 44.03% , respectively . statistical differences were found between the means of abg , ac 4-pta , and bc 4-pta in the otosclerotic ears in relation to ac - vemp elicitability .
bt: The aim of this prospective clinical study was to evaluate the clinical importance of potentially myogenic (vemps) vestibular evokants in the evaluation and differential diagnosis of otosclerosis and otological diseases characterized by pseudo-conducting components.We also studied the clinical aspect of balance disorders in patients with otosclerosis by correlating vemp results with the results of calorie and pure tone audiometry.

src: chronic hepatitis c infection poses a major global health predicament and appears to be potent threat to mankind . the treatment in wide use is interferon / ribavirin combination therapy which is generally effective in about 60 - 70 per cent of patients carrying genotype 3 and causes significant morbidity . the response to therapy is largely guided by limited number of factors such as genotype of virus , rapid virological response , ethnicity , pre - therapy viral load , etc .
bt: Chronic hepatitis C infection is a serious global health problem and appears to be a potent threat to humanity.The treatment in use is interferon/ribavirin combination therapy that is generally effective in about 60 - 70% of patients with genotype 3 causing significant morbidity.The response to therapy is largely guided by a limited number of factors such as the genotype of the virus, rapid virological response, ethnicity, pre-therapy viral caries, etc.

src: these loading conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very different and more complex than the customary lever - based gradient . the analyses also demonstrated the entirely different mechanical environments within intact and plated mandibles . because the loading and geometry of the lever - idealized mandible is incomplete , the associated widely accepted bone stress distribution ( tension on top and compression on the bottom ) should not be assumed .
bt: The carico conditions produced stress distributions within the intact mandible that were very diverse and more complex than the usual gradient a lev. Analyses also showed completely different mechanical environments within intact and riveted mandibles.As the carico and geometry of the idealized mandible a lev are incomplete, it should not assume the widely accepted bone stress distribution (high tension and low compression).

src: diabetes mellitus is a metabolic disorder and its subsequent complications such as retinopathy , nephropathy , ulcers , disability , and amputation increase the burden of the disease . patient knowledge - improving programs are employed to prevent disease progression and to improve the quality of life of the patients . in this way , we need to characterize the groups of patients in urgent need for more and rich - in - content programs .
bt: Diabetes is a metabolic disorder and its successive complications such as retinopathy, nephropathy, ulcers, disability and amputation increase the severity of the disease.Patient awareness-raising programs are employed to prevent the progression of the disease and improve the quality of life of patients.Thus, we must characterize groups of patients who urgently need richer content programs.

src: lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low - density lipoprotein cholesterol ( ldl - c ) . this study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and cardiac event rates before and after apheresis . an electronic health record screen of ambulatory patients identified 11 active patients undergoing lipid apheresis with 10/11 carrying a diagnosis of fh .
bt: Lipid apheresis is used to treat patients with severe hyperlipidemia by reducing low-density lipoprotein cholesterol (ldl - c).This study examines the effect of apheresis on the lipid panel and rates of heart events before and after apheresis.An electronic monitor of health data from outpatients has identified 11 active patients with 10/11 with diagnosis of fh.

bt: Therefore , we have tested the interaction of human oats2 with various substances using tritio-labelled cgmp . human oats have not shown any interaction with metabolites related to diabetes and ace inhibitors . However , the absorption of oat-dependent cgmp has been inhibited by furosemide .

src: here , the trypanocidal potential of gallates was assayed in epimastigotes forms of t. cruzi and also , the interference of these substances on the mitochondrial membrane potential of the parasites was assessed , allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the gallates in the t. cruzi organisms . regarding the preliminary structure - activity relationships , the side chain length of gallates plays crucial role for activity . nonyl , decyl , undecyl , and dodecyl gallates showed potent antitrypanosomal effect ( ic50 from 1.46 to 2.90 m ) in contrast with benznidazole ( ic50 = 34.0 m ) .
bt: The tripanocidal potential of the galls has been analyzed in epimastigote forms of t. cruzi and also, the interference of these substances with the potential of the mitochondrial membrane of the parasites has been evaluated, allowing the study of the mechanism of action of the galls in the organisms of t. cruzi. In relation to the preliminary structure - activity relationships, the length of the lateral chain of the galls plays a crucial role for the activity. Nonil, decil, undecyl and dodecyllates have shown a potent antitrypanosomal effect (IC50 at 1.46 to 2.90 m) in contrast to benznidazole (IC50 = 34.0 m)

src: early diagnosis and management of depression is important for better therapeutic outcome . strategies for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression are yet to be defined , resulting improper management . this study aims at comparing the socio - demographic and other variables between patients with unipolar and bipolar depression , along with assessment of severity of depression.this cross sectional study was conducted in a tertiary care psychiatry hospital in north - east india .
bt: Early diagnosis and management of depression are important for a better therapeutic outcome.The strategy for distinguishing between unipolar and bipolar depression has not yet been defined, which has led to improper management.This study aims to compare socio-demographic and other variables among patients with unipolar and bipolar depression, along with an assessment of the severity of the depression.

src: prune2 plays an important role in regulating tumor cell differentiation , proliferation , and invasiveness in neuroblastoma . our previous study revealed that prune2/obscn two - gene relative expression classifer accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromal tumor . however , the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood .
bt: Our previous study revealed that the relative expression of two prune2/obscn classificher genes accurately differentiated leiomyosarcoma from gastrointestinal stromale tumor, but the association between prune2 expression and prognosis in leiomyosarcoma is poorly understood.

src: the accumulation of excess body weight may have important health and disease consequences for persons with multiple sclerosis ( ms ) . this study examined the effect of weight status on mobility using a comprehensive set of mobility outcomes including ambulatory performance ( timed 25-foot walk , t25fw ; 6-minute walk , 6mw ; oxygen cost of walking , cw ; spatiotemporal parameters of gait ; self - reported walking impairment , multiple sclerosis walking scale-12 ( msws-12 ) ; and free - living activity , accelerometry ) in 168 ambulatory persons with ms . mean ( sd ) bmi was 27.7 ( 5.1 ) kg / m2 .
bt: This study examined the effect of weight on mobility using a complete set of mobility results including ambulatory performance (walking at 25 feet , t25fw; walking at 6 minutes , 6mw; cost of walking oxygen , cw; parameters of walking spacetime; self-reporting walking disorder , multiple sclerosis scales of walking-12 (msws-12 ); and free-living activity , accelerometry) in 168 ambulatory people with ms . median (sd) bmi age of 27.7 (5,1 kg) / m2 .

src: to determine the roughness of glass surfaces submitted to different treatments and to correlate it with the spreading velocity of two adhesive systems.glass slides were used as substrates to evaluate the spreading velocity of single bond and prime & bond nt adhesive systems . six different surface treatments were compared : 1 ) no treatment ; 2 ) silanization ( sl ) ; 3 ) sandblasting ( sb ) ; 4 ) sb + sl ; 5 ) 10% hydrofluoric acid treatment ( hf ) ; 6 ) hf + sl . before and after treatments , surface roughness was measured by a profilometer ( ra , m ) .
bt: To determine the roughness of glass surfaces subjected to various treatments and to correlate it with the diffusion rate of two adhesives systems.Glass slides have been used as substrate to evaluate the diffusion rate of a single bond system and the first and first bond .Six different surface treatments have been compared: 1 ) without treatment; 2 ) silanization (sl ); 3 ) sand (sb ) 4 ) sb + sl; 5 ) 10% with hydrofluoric fluoric acid (hf ); 6 ) hf + sl . before and after the treatments , the roughness has been measured with a profileometer (ra , m).

src: multiple sclerosis ( ms ) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence . onset of disease is most frequently in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest ; it is of chronic nature and , in the majority of patients , it will result in accumulation of disability . due to loss of productivity in patients and caregivers as well as high expenses for medical treatment , ms is considered a disease with high economic burden for patients and society .
bt: Multiple sclerosis (MS) is a common neurological disease with increasing incidence and prevalence.The onset of the disease is most common in young adulthood when productivity is usually highest; it is chronic in nature and , in most patients , if it results in accumulation of disability.

src: drug - induced gingival overgrowth ( digo ) can be a serious concern for both patients and clinicians . digo is a well - documented side - effect of some pharmacologic agents , including , but not limited to , calcium channel blockers , phenytoin , and cyclosporine . plasma cell granulomas ( pseudotumors ) are exceedingly rare , non - neoplastic , reactive tumor - like proliferation , primarily composed of plasma cells that manifest primarily in the lungs , but may occur in various anatomic locations .
bt: Digos is a well-documented side effect of some pharmacological agents , including but not limited to blockers of calcium channels , phenitoin and cyclosporin . Plasma cell granulomas (pseudotumors) are extremely rare , non- neoplastic , reactive tumors - such as proliferation , composed primarily of plasma cells that occur mainly in the lungs , but can occur in various anatomical locations .
